verses.verse: And when He had <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G3825>back<s%> to <S%G2746>Capernaum<s%> several <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G1223>afterward,<s%> it was <S%G191>heard<s%> that He was at <S%G3624>home.<s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that there was <S%G3371>no<s%> <S%G3371>longer<s%> <S%G5562>room,<s%> <S%G3366>even<s%> <S%G4314>near<s%> the <S%G2374>door;<s%> and He was <S%G2980>speaking<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> to them.
And they <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G5342>bringing<s%> to Him a <S%G3885>paralytic,<s%> <S%G142>carried<s%> by <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G5064>men.<s%>

And being <S%G3361>unable<s%> <S%G1410><s%> to <S%G4374>get<s%> to Him <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>crowd,<s%> they <S%G648>removed<s%> the <S%G4721>roof<s%> <S%G3699>above<s%> Him; and when they had <S%G1846>dug<s%> an opening, they <S%G5465>let<s%> <S%G5465>down<s%> the <S%G2895>pallet<s%> on <S%G3699>which<s%> the <S%G3885>paralytic<s%> was <S%G2621>lying.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3708>seeing<s%> their <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3885>paralytic,<s%> "My <S%G5043>son,<s%> your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven.<s%>"
But there were <S%G5100>some<s%> of the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> and <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> in their <S%G2588>hearts,<s%>

<S%G5101>"Why<s%> does <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3778>man<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> that <S%G3779>way<s%>? He is <S%G987>blaspheming;<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> but <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1520>alone<s%>?"

And <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G1921>aware<s%> in His <S%G4151>spirit<s%> that they were <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> that <S%G3779>way<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G5101>"Why<s%> are you <S%G1260>reasoning<s%> about <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things<s%> in your <S%G2588>hearts<s%>?

<S%G5101>"Which<s%> is <S%G2123>easier,<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to the <S%G3885>paralytic,<s%> 'Your <S%G266>sins<s%> are <S%G863>forgiven<s%>'; <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1453>'Arise,<s%> and <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2895>pallet<s%> and <S%G4043>walk<s%>'?

"But in <S%G2443>order<s%> that you may <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1849>authority<s%> on <S%G1093>earth<s%> to <S%G863>forgive<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%>" – He <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G3885>paralytic<s%> –
"I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G1453>rise,<s%> <S%G142>take<s%> up your <S%G2895>pallet<s%> and <S%G5217>go<s%> <S%G3624>home.<s%>"

And he <S%G1453>rose<s%> and <S%G2117>immediately<s%> <S%G142>took<s%> up the <S%G2895>pallet<s%> and <S%G1831>went<s%> out in the <S%G1715>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1839>amazed<s%> and were <S%G1392>glorifying<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "We have <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> anything <S%G3779>like<s%> <S%G3779>this.<s%>"
And He <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G3825>again<s%> by the <S%G2281>seashore;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> were <S%G2064>coming<s%> to Him, and He was <S%G1321>teaching<s%> them.

And as He <S%G3855>passed<s%> by, He <S%G3708>saw<s%> <S%G3017>Levi<s%> the [son] of <S%G256>Alphaeus<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> in the <S%G5058>tax<s%> <S%G5058>office,<s%> and He <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G190>"Follow<s%> Me!" And he <S%G450>rose<s%> and <S%G190>followed<s%> Him.

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that He was <S%G2621>reclining<s%> [at the table] in his <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners<s%> were <S%G4873>dining<s%> with <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples;<s%> for there were <S%G4183>many<s%> of them, and they were <S%G190>following<s%> Him.

And when the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3708>saw<s%> that He was <S%G2068>eating<s%> with the <S%G268>sinners<s%> and tax-gatherers, they [began] <S%G3004>saying<s%> to His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> is He <S%G2068>eating<s%> and <S%G4095>drinking<s%> with tax-gatherers and <S%G268>sinners<s%>?"

And <S%G191>hearing<s%> this, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "[It is] not <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2480>healthy<s%> who <S%G5532>need<s%> a <S%G2395>physician,<s%> but <S%G3588>those<s%> who are <S%G2560>sick;<s%> I did not <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2564>call<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> but <S%G268>sinners.<s%>"

And John's <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G3522>fasting;<s%> and they <S%G2064>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do John's <S%G3101>disciples<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G3522>fast,<s%> but Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> do not <S%G3522>fast<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1722>"While<s%> <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is with them, the <S%G5207>attendants<s%> of the <S%G3567>bridegroom<s%> do not <S%G3522>fast,<s%> do they? <S%G3745>So<s%> <S%G5550>long<s%> as they <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> with them, they <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3522>fast.<s%>

"But the <S%G2250>days<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> the <S%G3566>bridegroom<s%> is <S%G522>taken<s%> <S%G522>away<s%> from them, and <S%G5119>then<s%> they will <S%G3522>fast<s%> in that <S%G2250>day.<s%>

" <S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G1976>sews<s%> a <S%G1915>patch<s%> of <S%G46>unshrunk<s%> <S%G4470>cloth<s%> on an <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G2440>garment;<s%> <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> the <S%G4138>patch<s%> <S%G142>pulls<s%> <S%G142>away<s%> from it, the <S%G2537>new<s%> from the <S%G3820>old,<s%> and a <S%G5501>worse<s%> <S%G4978>tear<s%> <S%G1096>results.<s%>

"And <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> <S%G906>puts<s%> <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> into <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G779>wineskins;<s%> <S%G7507>otherwise<s%> the <S%G3631>wine<s%> will <S%G4486>burst<s%> the <S%G779>skins,<s%> and the <S%G3631>wine<s%> is <S%G622>lost,<s%> and the <S%G779>skins<s%> [as well;] but [one puts] <S%G3501>new<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> into <S%G2537>fresh<s%> <S%G779>wineskins.<s%>"

And it <S%G1096>came<s%> about that He was <S%G3899>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4702>grainfields<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> and His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> their <S%G3598>way<s%> along while <S%G5089>picking<s%> the <S%G4719>heads<s%> [of grain.]

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G3004>saying<s%> to Him, <S%G2396>"See<s%> <S%G2396>here,<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> are they <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> on the <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%>?"

And He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Have you <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G7035>David<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was in <S%G5532>need<s%> and became <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> he and his <S%G3588>companions<s%>: <S%G3326><s%>

<S%G4459>how<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G1909>time<s%> of Abiathar [the] <S%G8>high<s%> <S%G749>priest,<s%> and <S%G749>ate<s%> the <S%G2068>consecrated<s%> <S%G4286>bread,<s%> <S%G740>which<s%> is not <S%G3739>lawful<s%> for [anyone] to <S%G1832>eat<s%> <S%G2068>except<s%> the <S%G1508>priests,<s%> and he <S%G2409>gave<s%> [it] <S%G1325>also<s%> to <S%G2532>those<s%> who were with him? "
And He was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, "The <S%G4521>Sabbath<s%> was <S%G1096>made<s%> for <S%G444>man,<s%> and not <S%G444>man<s%> for the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>
<S%G5620>"Consequently,<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> of the <S%G4521>Sabbath.<s%>"
